amendment.description: To prohibit the Department of Defense from entering into contracts to facilitate payments for honoring members of the Armed Forces at sporting events.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1539 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1539 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3755-3756; text: CR S3755-3756) To prohibit the Department of Defense from entering into contracts to facilitate payments for honoring members of the Armed Forces at sporting events.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1539 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1539 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
